name: Broken Shield
description: Drink only half the amount (rounded up) you are forced to by any action targeted at you.

name: St. Patricks Day
description: Aquire at least 3 green objects and protect them from the other players. Drink:beer: everytime an item is stolen.
flavor: I'll be irish in a few beers.

name: Slow Motion
description: You only move at half speed (rounded up).
flavor: Slow and steady wins less of a hangover.

name: Clone Bay
description: Replay any one previously played action or event card of your choice.
flavor: Insanity: Doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results

name: Holy Shield
description: For any card, you may drink a shot:shot: to cancel the cards effect.

name: Light Feet
description: When moving to a square, you only trigger it's action if you rolled the dice to get there.

name: Piggy Bank
description: You drink:beer: any cards cost instead of paying it

name: Money Equals Power
description: For every 10 materials:material: you have, you pay one less when playing a card

name: Drunken Master
description: You get double the normal amount of materials:material: from finishing your drink
flavor: I've trained my entire life for this

name: Risky Business
description: While holding this card, drink only half the beer:beer: but double the shots:shot:.

name: Empty Hourglass
description: If you finish your drink during your own turn, you can choose to go again instead of any other rewards you might have received from finishing it.

name: Drinking Buddy
description: The enemy who holds this card always drinks half (rounded up) of whatever you drink.
flavor: It's always nice to have someone to drink with

name: The Bomb
description: Explodes after five rounds. When it does, drink two shots:shot: and remove this card.
flavor: They set us up the bomb

name: Twin-Headed Dragon
description: Double everything you are required to drink. For each extra shot:shot: drunk that way, you gain five materials:material:. For every drink:beer:, you gain one material:material:.
flavor: Twice the fun, double the trouble

name: The Leech
description: Give to an enemy. As long as they hold this card, you drink:beer: half their share (rounded down) and leech half the materials:material: whenever they gain any.

name: Diplomacy
description: You may choose between drinking shots:shot: and drinks:beer:. The exchange rate is 5:beer: = 1:shot:.

name: Thief
description: Whenever you land on a square with a player on it, you steal two materials:material: from that player.

name: Captain
description: Whenever you land on a square with a player on it, you can make that player drink:beer:.
flavor: Yo Ho and a bottle of rum

name: Push
description: Push an enemy forward 3 spaces.

name: Drunken Stumble
description: Move forward or backward X spaces up to a maximum of 4. Drink:beer: X * 2.
flavor: It always seems faster when you're drunk.

name: Ye Olde Switcheroo
description: For the next round, the chosen player drinks for you, and you for him.

name: Peer Pressure
description: Force everyone to take an action that you need to perform as well.
flavor: Peer pressure? More like beer pressure!

name: Swap
description: Swap everything (place, drink, materials, hand and status cards) except weapons with a player of your choice.

name: Force the Hand
description: Choose a player who immediately has to play one of his action cards.

name: Cleanse
description: Remove a status effect.
flavor: Cleansed in blood, reborn in sin

name: Tribute
description: Remove a status effect. Drink:beer: it's cost.
flavor: Apparently, alcohol sometimes is the solution.

name: Hoarder
description: Make a player drink:beer: equal to the combined cost of all cards he holds in his hands. At most, they player has to finish their drink.
flavor: The rich get richer. And drunker.

name: Enlightenment
description: Look at the top three event cards. Put them back in any order.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Choose a player, who immediately has to draw an event card and play it.

name: Snatch
description: Steal half of someones materials:material:.
flavor: You won't even notice they're gone

name: Black Hole
description: Both you and your target discard half their materials:material:.

name: The Void
description: Everyone loses all their materials:material: (including yourself), unless they finish their drink
flavor: Blackness will come, one way or the other

name: Sprint
description: Move twice the distance on your next dice roll.

name: Snipe
description: Force a player to finish their drink

name: Challenge Me!
description: The other players agree on a challenge and an amount in drinks:beer:. If you fail or refuse, you drink the amount. If you succeed, each of them drinks it.

name: Unstable Orbit
description: Swap all status cards in clockwise direction

name: Purge
description: Remove all of your status cards

name: Childhood Memories
description: The chosen player must jump up and down enthusiastically. Then they play the action of the square they are currently standing on again.

name: Pipe
description: Move to any enemy's square or force one enemy to move to yours

name: Tiny Teleport
description: Move to a square of your choice that's within five squares of you in either direction

name: Pocket Ace
description:
Choose one:
Gain five materials:material:.
Play an action card for free.
Remove a status card.

name: Lasso
description: Swap action cards in hand with a player of your choice
flavor: Just one of it's many uses

name: Thunderstorm
description: Give away all your status cards to the other players.

name: Trap
description: Can be played when another player targets you. Whatever effect would have applied to you, now applies to that player instead.

name: Scan
description: All enemy players must reveal their action cards.

name: Buyout
description: Immediately trade 20 materials:material: for one weapon.

name: Blitzkrieg
description: It's now your turn.

name: Stun Grenade
description: A player of your choice skips their next turn.

name: EMP
description: The chosen player drinks:beer: instead of receiving materials until their next turn.

name: Stomp
description: All enemies which are on the same square as you are loose half their materials.

name: Divine Intervention
description: Place the dice instead of rolling it.
